summary: Changes NPC's in various ways, can be used for fun, or just because you are SO SICK of some NPC's.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will transform all of the annoying NPC's in Whiterun Hold cities into something different, usually a creature. For example, Embry in Riverwood becomes a Dremora, and Farengar Secret-Fire Becomes a Werewolf. However, they do not become hostile, and you can almost always interact like you would usually... except you will be laughing. All of the "Quest Essential" NPC's are still able to be talked to, and nothing will have changed except their appearance. The ones that were not "Quest Essential" are sometimes not able to be talked to, however, these are the same NPC's that when just walking by them, will say the same things that they would if you talked to them, so again, nothing is affected accept their appearance.

- There is no Readme file, just read this.
USING NMM (Recommended)
1. Click the "Download with NMM" Button
2. Activate File

NOT USING NMM
1. Download file
2. Unzip it
3. Put the single file into your Data Folder

-Possible Bugs include unimportant things such as Nazeem never actually sleeping, just standing by his bed, and Sigurd just standing in front of his wood pile. Things like that.
author: Vegito73

files.name: Annoying NPC Appearance Changer- Whiterun Hold
